description.value:
Activate 2 Interact

A miniature mukradi, its chitin shrunken and pale, is coiled within this jar. Its hollow form grows to a Gargantuan shell when you open the jar. It emits one of three breath weapons, chosen by you. Each creature in the area must attempt a DC 34 basic Reflex save.

  • Acid Maw (acid) 10-foot-wide, @Template[line|distance:60] of acid dealing @Damage[12d6[acid]]. @Check[reflex|dc:34|basic|traits:acid]
  • Flame Maw (fire) @Template[cone|distance:60] of fire dealing @Damage[12d6[fire]]. @Check[reflex|dc:34|basic|traits:fire]
  • Shock Maw (electricity) @Template[line|distance:120] of electricity dealing @Damage[12d6[electricity]]. @Check[reflex|dc:34|basic|traits:electricity]

Craft Requirements Supply a mukradi corpse.
